Mendokusai

Tartarus

Exhaustion

29 Nov 2018

Yikes, I am so exhausted. Between the new (intense) gym programme, work being as busy as ever, a couple of side projects, trying to maintain a social life, decent sleep schedule AND not lose my mind... it's tough man. But the show must go on, so I'm off to the gym.
